snippet: Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull was criticized after giving a homeless man a few dollars in Melbourne this week, with some deriding it as a photo opportunity at odds with his policies....
abstract: Australian Prime Min Malcolm Tumball is photographed giving money to homeless person in Melbourne, drawing fierce reaction from critics who complain that his actions go against official efforts to address homelessness.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull was criticized after giving a homeless man a few dollars in Melbourne this week, with some deriding it as a photo opportunity at odds with his policies.

headline.main: Australian Premier’s Handout Spurs Debate on Best Way to Help Homeless People
headline.print_headline: Miser or Enabler? Australia’s Homelessness Debate
